author: Simon Difford
description: The name of this popular Cuban drink literally means 'stained Cuba' and there is just enough cola in this rum and soda to stain the drink brown.
name: Cuba Pintada
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
30 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass, briefly STIR and serve
